jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Platform
jobs_results.description:
Oura is an award-winning and fast-growing startup that helps people track all stages of sleep and activity using the Oura Ring and connected app. By providing daily feedback and practical steps to inspire healthy lifestyles, we've helped hundreds of thousands of people improve their sleep, understand their bodies, and transform their health. We’re on a mission to empower every person to own their inner potential, and we’re seeking candidates who want to make an impact on our journey.

We are looking for an iOS Developer to architect, design and develop lower-level functionality for the Oura iOS app in the App Platform team. This team works closely together with the Cloud Platform team, to push our app-server architecture to the next level. Other responsibilities of App Platform include - but are not limited to - developing our Bluetooth layer along with implementing support for next generation peripherals, implementing code generation tooling and finding out new frameworks and better practises, to constantly keep pushing the envelope forward. We care deeply about maintaining and upgrading our code base so that it is at the forefront of technology, and actively work to get rid of legacy implementations.

Together we are building a product that helps our users to get more restorative sleep, and to see how their lifestyle affects their body and mind.

Requirements

What You will do:

• Architect, design and build new features in the App Platform team
• Collaborate closely with our adjacent platform and feature squads to create solutions that open up new capabilities
• Collaborate closely with our Cloud Platform team to create the best possible app-server architecture going forward
• Ensure consistency across our apps
• Keep an eye on where the Android world is going and actively prototype and try out new frameworks and ways of working that improve our productivity
• Work with us to develop systems to ensure we provide performant, maintainable apps and improve the developer experience as we scale

We would love to have You on our team, if You have:

• A solid experience developing and shipping professional iOS applications
• Mastery over Swift
• Good technical specification skills and understanding of complex systems and how they can be made maintainable and productive to work with
• An excellent understanding of both user interface level and application engine level challenges and SDK APIs
• Pragmatic can-do attitude; shipping working software brings you joy
• Passion for the little things, in both engineering and UX
• Enjoy problem solving with people outside of your own domain

We also appreciate if You have knowledge on any of the following technologies:

• SQLite
• Combine
• Structured concurrency
• Instruments (application profiling)
• Dynamic frameworks
• SnapKit
• TypeScript
• Git workflows
• C++

If this sounds like the next step for you, please send us your application as soon as possible, but by January 3rd the latest. We will be starting the interviews for this position starting January 7th.

Benefits

• Competitive Salary
• Lunch benefit
• Wellness benefit
• Flexible working hours + work-life balance
• Collaborative, smart teammates
• An Oura ring of your own (if you want)
• Easy-to-reach offices in Oulu Teknologiakylä and in Helsinki city center
• Latest equipment of choice

Oura is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Individuals seeking employment at Oura are considered without regards to age, ancestry, color, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, socioeconomic status, protected family care or medical leave status, race, religion (including beliefs and practices or the absence thereof), sexual orientation, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. We will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a middle+/senior iOS Developer to join our team. As an iOS Developer, you will be building mobile applications for business needs.
We write code for iOS 14, use Swift 5+, MVVM architecture, SwiftUI, Core Data, XCTest, and manage tasks in JIRA. Our repositories are hosted on GitLab.

Responsibilities:
• Take part in the development of mobile apps with iOS
• Ensure the performance and quality of apps
• Work within a team of developers to complete proposed initiatives
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs

Skills:
• 3+ years of experience with custom iOS application development
• Proficient with Swift
• Understanding of REST API
• Familiarity with architectural design patterns (MVP, MVVM, Clean)
• Initiative, ability to work in a team
• Upper intermediate level in English

Desired:
• Knowledge of SwiftUI
• Experience with Unit/UI Tests
• Experience with CoreData/Realm

We offer:
• Flexible and hybrid work schedule
• Onboarding for new employees
• Opportunities for professional growth
• Work-life balance
• Comfortable and modern office in the city center
• Warm atmosphere in the team

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
🚀 What's the position?

This is a Full-time Senior iOS Developer position at Neybox for talented individuals who want to work on cutting-edge applications that positively impact the well-being of individuals worldwide.

💫 What will I be working on?

You'll be working on our two apps: Pillow, a sleep-tracking app, and Today, which is a quantified-self wellness app.

Both apps have won an Editors' Choice distinction and have been featured multiple times in press and media. They have millions of users worldwide and a great roadmap ahead.

🧑‍💻 What will be my role and responsibilities?

As a senior developer you will be responsible for
• Building new features
• Fixing bugs
• Maintaining the existing codebase
• Writting Unit Tests for existing and new features
• Making sure the documentation of the project is accurate and helpful
• Doing research on new technologies and frameworks
• ⚠️This is a position that requires a commitment of 40 hours per week. This is not a part-time position.

🛠️ What's the tech stack?

In a nutshell:

Both our apps are written in Swift (MVVM and MVC).

The UI is written in SwiftUI and UIKit.

We write Unit Tests; the code is clean and well-documented.

We make extensive use of various frameworks and machine learning.

Both apps are available for iOS only.

🌍 Can I work remotely?

Of course! Our team is 100% remote. We have flexible working hours, but a good overlap between our time zones is required.

🙌 What is it like working at Neybox?

Our team is small by design (6-8 people). However, we work closely together every day (Mon-Fri). For coordination, we use Slack and Jira and keep meetings at a minimum.

There's no middle management to get in the way, and we encourage new ideas and close collaboration.

💼 What are the requirements?
• 4+ years of iOS development experience in Swift
• Experience in HealthKit, CoreML SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, and WatchKit.
• Experience working with Git version control, Unit testing, and Continuous Integration
• Experience in performance profiling with Instruments on Xcode.
• Proficient use of English, both writing and speaking.
• Willingness to learn and experiment with new technologies.
• References from previous employers in written or spoken form may be required from previous employers.
• Proficient in usage of MacOS and iOS.

📥 Great! How can I apply?

Just hit "Apply" button below!

⚠️ Please note that this is the only acceptable way to apply. All other ways of contacting Neybox about the position (social media, LinkedIn, email etc.), will result in immediate rejection.

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Our mission at Oura is to empower every person to own their inner potential. Our award-winning products help our global community gain a deeper knowledge of their readiness, activity, and sleep quality by using their Oura Ring and its connected app. We've helped 2.5 million people understand and improve their health by providing daily insights and practical steps to inspire healthy lifestyles.

Oura’s engineering team, spread across the EU and US, collaborates in cross-functional feature squads or teams for day-to-day tasks. These autonomous squads develop and architect features, own their code, and manage the entire lifecycle from conception to bug fixes to realized value for Oura members.

This role is on-site or remote Finland-based with a preference for candidates who can regularly visit our offices in Helsinki or Oulu.

What you will do:

• Work together with a passionate team of engineers, designers, and product manager building a new product experiences for Oura members
• Develop and maintain high-quality iOS code with a focus on Heart Health features.
• Ensure high quality through code reviews, automatic testing, and engineering best practices.
• Collaborate with Oura teams on the science around new experiences and expert app engineers, ML engineers, behavioral scientists, and content creators.

Requirements

We would love to have you on our team if you have:

• A minimum of 3 years of professional development experience shipping iOS apps.
• Strong experience with Swift and UIKit, modern iOS app architectures, and common third-party libraries and frameworks.
• Experience with collaborative development on complex shared codebases.
• Proficiency with Git, branching, and standard code review workflows.
• A focus on quality through unit tests and manual testing.
• You care deeply about what you build as a whole, both from an engineering and end-user perspective.

We also appreciate if you have one or more of the following:

• Experience with any of the following iOS technologies: Swift structured concurrency, Combine, SQLite/GRDB, CoreAnimation, CoreGraphics, PyTorch.
• Experience working asynchronously across countries and time zones.
• Experience with health, wellness, or fitness products.
• Strong systems architecture and performance optimization experience.
• Deep computer science fundamentals and design patterns knowledge
• Contributions to open-source projects or an impressive personal portfolio

Benefits

• Competitive salary
• Lunch benefit
• Wellness benefit
• Flexible working hours
• Collaborative, smart teammates
• An Oura ring of your own
• Personal learning & development program
• Wellness Time Off

If this sounds like the next step for you, please send us your application and CV as soon as possible, but by Jan 7th 2025 at the latest. We aim to start interviewing as soon as possible but will be out for the Christmas holidays.

Oura is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Individuals seeking employment at Oura are considered without regards to age, ancestry, color, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, socioeconomic status, protected family care or medical leave status, race, religion (including beliefs and practices or the absence thereof), sexual orientation, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. We will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics.

jobs_results.title: ios developer
jobs_results.description:
Zalando fulfills more than 200 million orders every year and the volumes are increasing. Whenever a customer experiences our shop the technology is at the scene and behind the scenes - software makes our systems work. Emerging Propositions teams are responsible for enabling and evolving product offerings in Beauty, Designer and Pre-owned categories. We solve customer problems related to unique customer experiences and assortment properties like high number of makeup shades, distinct presentation of luxury brands.

As a Senior iOS Software Engineer in Emerging Propositions, you will be joining an agile cross functional team that builds solutions for Zalando's Fashion Store applications (Android and iOS) as well as the website in the domain of content and inspiration. This role provides a unique opportunity to collaborate in a multidisciplinary team of mobile, web, and backend engineers and shape the next chapter in Zalando customer experience and we will support you to grow and work with exciting modern technologies.

INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN

At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy: https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups: https://corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups

WHAT WE'D LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)You will be part of an agile cross functional team and play a key role in solution design, planning, development, deployment, operating and improving scalable software solutions for Zalando's mobile application
Together with your multidisciplinary team, you contribute to the codebases and you lean on your iOS experience and skill set, write robust, performant and maintainable code aiming at very high quality and clean code
Take an active role in work towards reducing ambiguity, understanding business requirements and translating them into technical solutions and requirements.
Collaborate closely with Product Management and design to refine designs and functional requirements and you create test cases to be verified during development and feature release
Participate in code reviews, adhere to best practices sharing and developing your expertise together with your team and you use feedback as an opportunity for growth
Proactively help in the growth of juniors and peers in your team and beyond

WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IFYou are an experienced iOS developer who is eager to work with new technologies while trying to challenge yourself and deliver high-quality code
Deep hands on experience in using Swift, iOS Frameworks & APIs like UIKit, Foundation, Core Data, Core Animation, and others
Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, JSON, SQLite, and networking libraries like e.g. Alamofire and software design patterns and paradigms
Understanding and experience with MVC, MVVM, VIPER, and other architectural patterns
You have made the applications resilient and reliable and you write well structured, readable, and maintainable code that's covered by unit tests
You have hands-on experience with profiling, debugging, and optimizing iOS applications for performance and memory usage
You have several years of experience working in high performance teams and can independently drive technical discussions and facilitate complex decision making processes
Positive energy and no-job-is-beneath-you attitude and you're a team player with an attitude of accountability, knowledge-sharing and self direction

If you think you have what it takes, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every single requirement. You may just be the right candidate for this or other roles.

OUR OFFER Centrally located and accessible office in Kamppi, Helsinki city center, with diverse working and entertainment spaces and healthy snacks and drinks available.
Hybrid work model of up to 60% remote work and flexible working times.
40% Zalando shopping discount for employees, employee share shop, bike benefit, and Edenred benefits for lunch, sports and culture, commuting and massage.
Extensive occupational health care and child care benefits.
Additional holidays and volunteering time off.
Supportive and active international community of colleagues for onboarding, mentoring, continued learning and for having fun through diverse offering of meetups and events, knowledge guilds and Employee Resource Groups with open source commitment.
Relocation assistance for internationals.

Learn all about Zalando and our values here: https://jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh_src=22377bdd1us. For more information about our office and teams in Helsinki, please visit: https://jobs.zalando.com/en/where-we-work/helsinki

Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

jobs_results.title: SENIOR IOS DEVELOPER (Espoo, Finland)
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a senior iOS developer to help our client to develop their cloud platform. The client wants you to be the leading expert in relation to iOS development in the development team. Your responsibility is to develop a cloud gaming service for the iOS client. However, no game development or graphic experience is needed as the product is not a mobile game.

For this role, the senior-level experience is a minimum requirement for it is expected to be able to produce clean quality code that is scalable and to have a very good skillset regarding architecture in general. You are a good match if you are able to work rather independently, enjoy sharing your knowledge, and follow the latest technologies in software development.

Your qualifications

The main requirements for this project are:

– Senior-level experience with development projects in the iOS environment

– Strong skills with Swift programming language

– Good architecture know-how

– You know what it takes to produce scalable, clean, quality code

Location: Espoo on-site, flexibility for remote work as well

Work: Full-time

Start date: ASAP, but negotiable

Duration: Long-term, open duration (1-year contract to begin with)

Language: Fluent English and/or Finnish

pay rate $40-50

Are you interested?

If this opportunity interests you and you would like to know more, forward your CV immediately to

Info@statetech.net

Job Features

Job Category

Mobile Developer

Qualification

a:2:{s:5:"label";s:13:"Qualification";s:5:"value";s:5:"Swift";}

Experience

a:2:{s:5:"label";s:10:"Experience";s:5:"value";s:7:"3+ Year";}

Pay Rate

a:2:{s:5:"label";s:8:"Pay Rate";s:5:"value";s:9:"40-50 /hr";}

jobs_results.title: Mobile Software Engineer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Are you passionate about building amazing mobile applications? Do you want to shape the future of enterprise communication with video? If yes, then join our team of skilled professionals, we have the role for you!

Dream Broker, a fast-growing online video software company, is looking for a Mobile Software Engineer with iOS experience. Developing and engineering scalable, secure, and maintainable software is central to our team’s success, and as an experienced engineer you take pride and are motivated by this.

Key responsibilities
• Designing, implementing, and testing clear and elegant software systems
• Developing and engineering robust solutions to our products and continuously grow as a professional
• Developing and improving tools and processes to further advance team productivity and quality
• Working with the latest technologies and following industry standards

Expectations
• Proficiency with iOS native (Swift) development
• Experience in the following technologies: MVC/MVVM architecture, SnapKit, Alamofire, Realm, Git
• A drive to learn new technologies and ability to work in a collaborative, test-driven, and agile development
• An academic degree in Computer Science or relevant work experience
• At least three years of experience in mobile development
• Collaborative way of working, readiness to own of entire concepts
• Fluent professional communication skills in English

Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline, Fastlane, Sentry.io and experience in cyber security is also valued.

We are ready to hire as soon as we find the right person matching the position and our company. Due to the high cyber security standards this is a full-time and on-site role based in Espoo or Turku, Finland.

Please apply by submitting your application letter and CV (in English) to tech-careers@dreambroker.fi with the title “Mobile Software Engineer (iOS)” or by submitting the form below.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (iOS/Android)
jobs_results.description:
Haluatko olla mukana rakentamassa tulevaisuuden digitaalista maailmaa?

Etsimme intohimoista Mobile Developeria, joka innostuu huipputeknologioista ja kokee paloa innovaatioita kohtaan. Etsimme juuri sinua, kokenutta mobiilikehittäjää, jolla on halu luoda ratkaisuja sekä iOS- että Android-alustoilla, järjestelmäriippumattomasti tai natiivisti.

Me ALTENilla olemme digitaalisen maailman edelläkävijöitä, jotka mullistavat yritysten toimintatapoja eri aloilla. Ketterä ja tulevaisuuteen suuntautunut tiimimme on sitoutunut ylittämään rajoja ja rakentamaan seuraavan tason ohjelmistoratkaisuja, jotka muovaavat tulevaisuutta. Mobiilikehittäjänä meillä sinulla on mahdollisuus työskennellä uraauurtavien projektien parissa alan parhaimpien rinnalla.

Roolissa onnistumisen mahdollistaa:
• Ohjelmointikielet (Kotlin, Swift, Dart, JavaScript/TypeScript, C#)
• Mobiilisovelluskehysten tuntemus (Flutter, React Native, Xamarin)
• Versionhallintataidot (Git, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket)
• Jatkuvan integroinnin ja julkaisun toteutukset (Jenkins)
• Mobiilitestaus- ja mobiilivarmennuskokemus (esim. Appium, JUnit, OAuth, Firebase Authentication)
• Vähintään 5 vuoden aikaisempi kokemus mobiilikehittämisestä,
• ja sujuva suomen sekä englannin kielen taito

Huomioithan, että kaikkien teknologioiden ei tarvitse olla sinulle tuttuja roolissa onnistumiseksi.

Lisäksi eduksi katsomme:
• Muun ohjelmistokehitystaidon ja -kokemuksen
• Soveltuvan alemman tai ylemmän korkeakoulututkinnon

Tarjoamme sinulle:
• Innovaatiivisen työympäristön ja haasteita: Pääset työskentelemään inspiroivassa ympäristössä, jossa luovuus ja tekninen osaaminen yhdistyvät. Meidän tavoitteemme on aina kehittää uusia ja innovatiivisia ratkaisuja asiakkaidemme tarpeisiin.
• Ammatillisen kasvun ja kehityksen avaimet: Jatkuva oppiminen ja ammatillinen kehitys kasvattaa taitojasi ja asiantuntemustasi. Sinulla on myös mahdollisuus osallistua Tech Week -tapahtumiin ja suorittaa IT-alan sertifikaatteja.
• Monipuolisen työn ja tiiviin tiimin: Pääset kannustavaan ja osallistavaan työympäristöön, jossa arvostetaan panostasi ja edistetään henkilökohtaista kasvua. Liity osaavien ja innostuneiden kehittäjien joukkoon, jotka jakavat intohimon ohjelmointiin. Meillä jokainen ääni kuuluu, ja yhteistyö on avain menestykseemme.
• Haastavia projekteja: Pääset työskentelemään monipuolisten ja merkityksellisten projektien parissa. Kehität ohjelmistoja, jotka vaikuttavat suoraan ihmisten arkeen ja muuttavat alan standardit. Olet mukana rakentamassa tulevaisuutta!

Toivomme, että olet meidän tuleva Mobile Developer!

Jos koit värähtelyä screenin sillä puolen ja haluat liittyä tiimiimme, lähetäthän hakemuksen palkkatoiveineen oheisen linkin kautta viimeistään 19.1.2025.

Miksi ALTEN?

Meille ALTENilla on tärkeää tarjota työntekijöillemme työnteon vastapainoksi arkea parantavia etuuksia. Pakettiin kuuluu mahtavien työkavereiden sekä huumorintajuisen työyhteisön lisäksi muitakin etuja, kuten joustava etätyö/hybridimalli, lounas-, liikunta- ja kulttuuriedut sekä sporttisimmille tarjoamme myös mahdollisuuden työsuhdepyöräetuun.

Osa kulttuuriamme on yhteinen ajanvietto myös työn ulkopuolella erinäisten tapahtumien parissa. Pohjoisen tai saariston seuduista innostuville tiedoksi, että lisäksi meillä on mahdollisuus hyödyntää ALTENin lomamökkejä, joita löytyy esimerkiksi Sallan ja Kustavin kauniista maisemista. Huolehdimme työntekijöidemme terveydestä tarjoamalla laajan työterveyshuoltopalvelun sekä kattavan vapaa-ajan tapaturmavakuutuksen.

jobs_results.title: Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
jobs_results.description:
Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
RIWA - All geoinformation becomes a digital experience

RIWA GmbH is a leading company in the field of geoinformation and municipal specialist processes with over 25 years of experience and market leader in Bavaria. Our team develops innovative solutions for the digital transformation of cities and municipalities, in particular through geographic information systems (GIS). We also create digital twins of municipalities for construction planning, energy management and sustainable urban development. We offer customized solutions and attach great importance to close cooperation.

Become part of our team in one of our branches in Augsburg, Memmingen or Kempten im AllgÃ¤u. After training, you can also work from home.
These are your tasks
• Further development of our native RIWA GIS Android app
• Implementation of our previous apps for Apple iOS with Kotlin & Compose Multiplatform
• Quality assurance through code reviews, unit tests and automated test procedures
• Technical conceptualization of functional requirements from product management
• Advising product management on development issues
You know your way around this
• Completed studies in computer science or equivalent training
• Sound knowledge in the development of Android apps (Kotlin, Java, Android SDK). Basic knowledge of iOS development advantageous (Swift)
• Ideally experience with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform
• Expertise with automated tests, CI/CD processes and agile software development
• Knowledge of designing appealing user interfaces is a plus
• Independent working style, ability to work in a team and a high level of self-motivation
What we offer you
• A great team - #GernePerDu - and a varied job in the office and home office
• Attractive salary, 13 monthly salaries, capital-forming benefits and a performance bonus
• Family-friendly working time models with flexible working hours (flexitime)
• Corporate benefits such as a job bike, drinks flat rate or employee discounts with over 1,500 providers
• Intensive training in the field of activity and regular further training
• An exciting environment with varied tasks
• A secure, modern workplace close to the city center with future prospects
Have we piqued your interest?

Please send us your complete application documents directly online via our applicant management system, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
RIWA GmbH

An der NeumÃ¼hle 5, 87700 Memmingen
Everyone is welcome at RIWA. Diversity and equal opportunities are an integral part of our company. We see the uniqueness of each individual, and therefore the diversity of our teams, as the driving force behind our daily work and innovations. - We look forward to meeting you.

+

Online application
